TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lubas-Mapalaway-mibahbah, title = Lubas-Mapalaway-mibahbah, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lubas-Mapalaway-mibahbah} }

S.FORM: mibahbah kakilimaan u kawaw nu mapalaway nilacul u sulit nu Hulam: sapibetik a kamu nu Sakizaya p.172 p.177 sakatinacay ipabaway nu di'tu nabalucu'an niyam miawaw tisuwan ipabaway nu di'tu na paaninen kami tu icelangay a palaw amana ka talahad tu balucu' caay pata uzip ku talahaday a di'tu amana ka imelang tu balucu' natu kabili tu mumul sakatinusa ipabaway nu di'tu iniw ku tunuz basis atu epah kukay tuni paain namu tu icelangay a palaw caay pata uzip ku talahaday a di'tu na paaninen kami tu icelang atu tineng bahbahen ku talahaday a di'tu atu maunigayay akilulen niyam ku icelang nayay ku katalawan nu kakawsan misikul paayaw tu niyazu' napaaninen kami tu icelang bahbahen ku talahaday a di'tu atu mauningayay mikilul tu tangah nu kakawsan misikul midiput tu niyazu' sakatinulu ipabaway nu kakawsan mahenmin tu kina tulu patakid nasakamun kami izaw tu kuni pisilud niyam tu palu' pakay nipakatineng nu misu napaaninen kami tu icelang malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan sapibetik a kamu nu Sakizaya
